relation: i have never had any reason to worry here.
alaska is a great place to live and you will definitely see a moose :)
there are some small coffee shops but i am not familiar with a good place to eat here.
i have not lived in the dorms at this campus.
take your studies seriously and strive to be the best at what you do. spend time and consideration to choose the career field that fits you best.
alaska pacific is a place where students get to know their professors. alaska pacific sets students up to be employable. alaska pacific students know what it means to be professional.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students Open minded, willing to learn things outside courses and take initiative in discussions and who learn better by doing and talking about the topic at hand. Tips for prospective students Be open and expressive Bang for the buck Fairly high tuition but very much worth it, professors will answer any questions you have and advisors, teachers, staff, other students always have an open ear. Am enjoying being here Great welcoming atmosphere, friendly people. Professors always welcome questions even if they're not precisely on topic they will do their best to answer and if they cannot figure out an answer (i.e philosophical type question) students are asked and it becomes a discussion usually Am learning a lot Very open and largely discussion based courses Login to rate or flag the reviews Jesus from Eagle Pass, TX 10/13/2010 Reviewer is Researching this school. Reviewer has been to campus.
